sentence: “I’m a gambler,” Trump told one aide about wading into the Pennsylvania primary a second time—this time to endorse fellow TV huckster Dr. Mehmet Oz.
title: Trump's loving every minute of kneecapping Republicans' midterm chances

sentence: “But the endorsements have also provoked backlash from some Republicans who believe Trump has betrayed his core supporters by backing Hillbilly Elegy author JD Vance in Ohio and TV’s Dr. Mehmet Oz in Pennsylvania.
author: Taegan Goddard
title: Trump’s Endorsements Bring Cash Windfall, Backlash

sentence: —This Week (@ThisWeekABC) April 24, 2022 Christie continued by saying Trump's endorsements landed "all over the place," referencing Trump's Senate endorsements of "Hillbilly Elegy" author JD Vance and TV personality Dr. Mehmet Oz, Both endorsements received backlash from Republican party officials.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Chris Christie says Donald Trump's endorsements are 'emotional decisions' and not 'political analysis'
